name: Seedling
storyline: A small boy is born from the wind, appearing in front of a house. He doesn't know his purpose, but knows that this house is important. This house holds his answers--and the beginnings of an arduous journey that will introduce him to creatures and objects he has never seen, as well as bring him to question right and wrong.
summary: Seedling is a top-down, exploration based, action-adventure flash game, made by Connor Ullmann, featuring several dungeons, items, bosses, and more!
